description: This file defines the NotesDbHelper class, which manages the creation, configuration, and upgrading of an SQLite database for a notes application. It sets up tables for notes, tags, and the association between notes and tags, including foreign key constraints.

classes.name: NotesDbHelper
classes.description: A helper class for managing database creation and version management for notes, tags, and their associations.

methods.name: onConfigure
methods.description: Enables foreign key constraints when the database configuration occurs.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Creates the notes, tags, and note_tags tables in the database.

methods.name: onUpgrade
methods.description: Handles database schema upgrades by dropping existing tables and recreating them.
